oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EUROPARL Corpus Parallel Corpora: Portuguese-English
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The EUROPARL Corpus (subpart Portuguese-English of the parallel corpora), available at http://www.statmt.org/europarl/, was extracted from the proceedings of the European Parliament (Koehn, 2005). It contains transcriptions of sessions dating back from 1996 to 2011, in a total of approximately 58,324,562 tokens words of European Portuguese (L1) and 49,216,896 tokens of English (translation).
